Reviews.Content: hotel lovely outdoor pool comfortable spacious makeover soft furnishings food restaurant helpful waiters disheartening maitre unable speak word english checking meal bills altered staff tip values increased instances double actual coffee meal cost management dealt promptly check slips carefully
